misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée from St. Laurence Golf, is known for his affable nature and his powerful game. While Jussi will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his presence will surely be missed by fellow competitors and fans alike.

Known for his strategic approach to the game, Jussi has participated in the Hector Trophée on four occasions, showcasing his skills in both individual and pair formats. Although victory has eluded him thus far, Jussi's commitment to the sport remains unwavering.

Off the course, Jussi is known for his sportsmanship and camaraderie, always ready with a smile and a word of encouragement. On the tee, Jussi favors a 'power draw', bending the ball powerfully from right to left.
